abstract.text: Discover how you can integrate CarPlay into modern vehicle systems. We‚Äôll show you how to adjust CarPlay for any high-resolution display ‚Äî regardless of configuration or size. Learn how you can use CarPlay-supplied metadata and video streams to show information on additional displays, and find out how advances in wireless connectivity, audio, and video encoding can help prepare your vehicle system for the next generation of CarPlay.

abstract.text: CarPlay is a smarter, safer way to use your iPhone while you drive. Learn about the latest app types for CarPlay and discover how the CarPlay Simulator can help you develop and test apps without leaving your desk. We‚Äôll also explore how navigation apps can connect with digital instrument clusters in supported vehicles.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

Learn how you can upgrade your app‚Äôs AirPlay audio experience to be more robust and responsive. We‚Äôll show you how to adopt enhanced audio buffering with AVQueuePlayer, explore alternatives when building a custom player in your app, and share best practices.

abstract.text: Xcode 15, Swift 5.9, iOS 17, macOS 14 (Sonoma), tvOS 17, visionOS 1, watchOS 10.

CarPlay is a smarter, safer way to use your iPhone in the car. Learn how to update your vehicle system to take advantage of new features in iOS 13. Add support for dynamically changing screen sizes, second screens such as instrument clusters, and even irregularly shaped displays. Learn how to support ‚ÄúHey Siri‚Äù for hands-free voice activation.
